segments.text: From my spot, I observe the light streaming through the window, illuminating the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything seems calm and neat outside, while chaos brews within.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s expression lacks any sense of alarm; she’s focused on a simple task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can’t ignore the water spilling over from the sink—it’s maddening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that boy on the stool seems to be playing a dangerous game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far, with cookies almost within reach, but at what cost?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the tips of the stool wobbling; it’s like a dance with danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks up at him, her eagerness palpable, but it fills me with dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can’t they see the risks? It’s nerve-wracking to watch them!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And yet, part of me wants to see them succeed, to get their cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
